verses.verse: <S%H1288>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul!<s%> All that is <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H6944>me,<s%> praise his holy <S%H8034>name!<s%>
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H7911>don't<s%> forget all his <S%H1576>benefits;<s%>
who <S%H5545>forgives<s%> all your <S%H5771>sins;<s%> who <S%H7495>heals<s%> all your <S%H8463>diseases;<s%>
who <S%H1350>redeems<s%> your <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H7845>destruction;<s%> who <S%H5849>crowns<s%> you with loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and tender <S%H7356>mercies;<s%>
who <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> your <S%H5716>desire<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5271>things,<s%> so that your youth is <S%H2318>renewed<s%> like the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>'s.
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>acts,<s%> and justice for all who are <S%H6231>oppressed.<s%>
He made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> his <S%H5949>deeds<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>
He will not <S%H5331>always<s%> <S%H7378>accuse;<s%> neither will he <S%H5201>stay<s%> angry <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He has not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us according to our <S%H2399>sins,<s%> nor <S%H1580>repaid<s%> us for our <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
For as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are high <S%H1361>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so <S%H1396>great<s%> is his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> toward those who fear <S%H3373>him.<s%>
As far <S%H7368>as<s%> the <S%H4217>east<s%> is from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> so far has he <S%H7368>removed<s%> our transgressions from <S%H6588>us.<s%>
Like a <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on his <S%H1121>children,<s%> so <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on those who fear <S%H3373>him.<s%>
For he <S%H3045>knows<s%> how we are <S%H3336>made.<s%> He <S%H2142>remembers<s%> that we are <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
As for <S%H582>man,<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are like <S%H2682>grass.<s%> As a <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> so he <S%H6692>flourishes.<s%>
For the <S%H7307>wind<s%> passes <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H4725>it,<s%> and it is gone. Its place remembers it no <S%H5234>more.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> with those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H6666>him,<s%> his righteousness to <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children;<s%>
to those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> to those who <S%H2142>remember<s%> to <S%H6213>obey<s%> his <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3559>established<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> His <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> rules over <S%H4910>all.<s%>

<S%H1288>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H1368>his,<s%> who are mighty in <S%H3581>strength,<s%> who <S%H6213>fulfill<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H8085>obeying<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you <S%H6635>armies<s%> of <S%H8334>his,<s%> you servants of <S%H6213>his,<s%> who do his <S%H7522>pleasure.<s%>
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H4725>his,<s%> in all places of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%> <S%H1288>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul!<s%>
